name: Is That Bard Ok?
description:
Somewhere in the English countryside, two average British blokes walk their dog down a public footpath that separates the local woods and a farmer’s field.

“Hark!” one of the gentlemen exclaims. “That yonder Bard do certainly appear disgruntled”.

“I concur! Perhaps he requires our assistance?” The other retorts.

“Nay, his friends appear to be taking care of the problem”

Little did they know, that was the exact reason the Bard was so morose about his current happenstance. His whole purpose within this group of powerful individuals was to ensure that they strike true, and all blades fall short of them.

The Bard’s party had set out to dispatch foul knaves from Castle Rocky that threaten the lands of Townsplace.

Help the Bard get through his troublesome shift by assigning the dice correctly in order to help his party win.

Sometimes a golden dice will appear! That will enhance the parties attack, so use it wisely!
